title: A Night to remember [DVD]
creator_credit: Sidney Hayers, Roy Baker, William MacQuitty and Rank Film Distributors
brief_description: The dramatic story of the first sailing and sinking of the ocean liner, “Titanic” in 1912. “RMS Titanic”, the liner they said was unsinkable, struck an iceberg and sank with the loss of 1500 lives. The film faithfully depicts the heroism and horror of the night the unthinkable happened. Starring Kenneth More, Laurence Naismith and David MacCallum as the radio operator. From the book by Walter Lord.
